plot: A send up of the Hollywood movie-making machine. Animated sequences hilariously depict blockbuster sequels as Hollywood executives argue the merits of originality vs. box office success.
title: Blockbusted
plot_es: A send up of the Hollywood movie-making machine. Animated sequences hilariously depict blockbuster sequels as Hollywood executives argue the merits of originality vs. box office success.
plot_en: A send up of the Hollywood movie-making machine. Animated sequences hilariously depict blockbuster sequels as Hollywood executives argue the merits of originality vs. box office success.
